Description: Replay Guitar Exchange presents this Gibson Les Paul Studio from 2004 in a warm Transparent Green color. This Les Paul presents a pair of 490R/498T pickups with a Nashville Tune-O-Matic bridge and Klusion tuners. A mahogany body and neck is attached to a rosewood fingerboard, and a pair of after-market Dunlop strap locks accompany the tail ends of the guitar - allowing stable strap use without the fear of slipping. This 2004 Les Paul Studio is in very good condition, with no issues to speak of, and an estimated 80% fret life remaining. This model does not come with a case, but this doesn't stop it from being a powerful tool in a guitarist's arsenal. As always, feel free to contact our store for more details, or with any questions. Weight: 8 lbs. 2 oz. Neck material: mahogany Scale length: 24.75" Nut width: 1.671" Fingerboard radius: 12" Neck shape: Fifties style Fingerboard material: rosewood Frets: 22, medium jumbo Country of origin: USA Case not included Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Used 2004 Gibson Les Paul Studio, Transparent Green
